Slimebound:EmptySlimeSlot.NAME: Slime Slot
DESCRIPTION: Slime minions can be placed in these slots through #ySplitting.

Slimebound:BronzeSlime.NAME: Bronze Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn and skips its next attack.

Slimebound:AttackSlime.NAME: Bruiser Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. When upgraded, increase damage by #b3.

Slimebound:GeneralSlime.NAME: General Slime
DESCRIPTION: random other Slimes at the start of your turn or when Commanded. When upgraded, increase the number of Slimes Commanded by #b1.

Slimebound:TarrSlime.NAME: Tarr Slime
DESCRIPTION: #yRotates to the front at the start of your turn. Cannot be upgraded.

Slimebound:RecklessSlime.NAME: Reckless Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. Whenever you play a #yTackle, #yCommand this. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.

Slimebound:HungrySlime.NAME: Hungry Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. Whenever you #yConsume, #yCommand this. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.

Slimebound:ScrapOozeSlime.NAME: Scrap Ooze
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. NL Can be revived if #yAbsorbed.

Slimebound:GreedOozeSlime.NAME: Greed Ooze
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. NL Can be revived if #yAbsorbed.

Slimebound:TorchHeadSlime.NAME: Torch Head Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. Gains damage from your #yStrength.

Slimebound:CultistSlime.NAME: Cultist Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. After attacking, increases its damage by #b1.

Slimebound:ShieldSlime.NAME: Armored Slime
DESCRIPTION: #yBlock at the start of your turn. When upgraded, increase #yBlock by #b2.

Slimebound:PoisonSlime.NAME: Guerilla Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.

Slimebound:SlimingSlime.NAME: Mire Slime
DESCRIPTION: #yGoop at the start of your turn. When upgraded, increase Goop by #b3.

Slimebound:HexSlime.NAME: Ghostflame Slime
DESCRIPTION: #ySoulburn at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:ChampSlime.NAME: Insulting Slime
DESCRIPTION: #yVulnerable at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:SlowingSlime.NAME: Time Slime
DESCRIPTION: #yWeak at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:ProtectorSlime.NAME: Spiky Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn and grants you #b

Slimebound:DrawingSlime.NAME: Ancient Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn and causes you to draw #b

Slimebound:DarklingSlime.NAME: Darkling Slime
DESCRIPTION: damage at the start of your turn. When you Command, all Darklings will attack (regardless of position).
